about_the_game:
WELCOME TO BERRYVILLE!

OH NO! The town of Berryville is in dire need of help! This town of bears needs a crafty entrepreneur to help get them out of financial hardship and recover from a bad storm! Can you help? You will only have a short amount of time to get to financial success before you lose everything and the town goes to ruin.

Wait! Don’t worry! You have the help of the Four Money Bears! These cute financial partners will help guide you to learn to manage money. With the support of Spender, Saver, Investor and Giver bear you'll be able to make your financial dreams come true and maybe even learn something along the way!

BECOME THE BEST MERCHANT.

  • Can you become the biggest merchant in the world? You'll have to beat the competition and manage your money wisely.

  • Use all the town's resources at your disposal and unlock and craft tons of recipes.  

MAKE ALL THE MONIES.

  • You will surely have to make all the monies to pay off your loan. Haggle with customers or improve your relationship with them.

  • Watch the berry stock market and guess when prices will sky rocket or drop.

  • Complete quests to improve your financial scores.

  • Learn tips and tricks on how to be successful!

GAME FEATURES

  • Business and Financial Basics.

  • Survive Off the Land by Fishing, Mining, and Collecting Resources.

  • Hire Farmers to Grow Many Varieties of Berry Crops.

  • Explore and find treasure.

  • Help your community by helping others.

  • Track your progress and see your growth!

Based on the award winning children's book. 

Is this an educational game?

Yes! We're not hiding that Berryville will teach kids around a 5th grade reading level about money management. What is hidden is the education, we integrated it so deeply that the core game loop is about learning how to manage money.

As they say ~ the best way to learn is by doing!

BACKED BY CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNERS.

  • If you’re looking for a fun cozy business sim, this is for you. 

  • If you’re looking for your child to learn money management at a basic core level, this is for you.

name: The Four Money Bears: Berryville
short_description: Learn to Make Millions in this Cozy Merchant Sim. Build a business and beat the competition to become the biggest merchant in the world by learning smart financial habits, behaviors and traits. Craft pies & jams from tons of different berries. Have fun running your shop & helping your community!
